channel.title: Npc dialogue help

item.title: Npc dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Go to where your FirstClickNpc packet is handled and declare the case and what dialogue id to send.

You’ve told the server what you want the NPC Sailor to say, but you haven’t told the server what to do when you click the first option on the sailor NPC (which is to send what you want the Sailor to say).

Source?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

Could someone tell my why this isn’t working…? I try to talk to the npc and nothing happens

case 567: sendNpcChat1("Ahoy, would yee like to go to the secret island?", c.talkingNpc,"Sailor"); c.nextChat = 568; break;

Read full topic
